column.label: Filename
column.tooltip: Name of original input spectrum file containing this spectrum

column.label: Scan
column.tooltip: Scan number of this spectrum in original input spectrum file

column.label: ClusterIndex
column.tooltip: Index of the cluster containing this spectrum. Similar spectra are clustered together via MS Cluster if "Run MS Cluster" was selected

column.label: Spectral Library
column.tooltip: Library containing peptide

column.tooltip: Library containing peptide

column.tooltip: Peptide sequence with neighboring amino acids

column.label: Protein
column.tooltip: Protein name

column.label: Charge
column.tooltip: Precursor ion charge

column.label: Score
column.tooltip: MS-GF raw score of the peptide-spectrum match

column.label: SpecProb
column.tooltip: Probability that a spectrum matches a random peptide with a score equal to or exceeding the observed score

column.label: DB E-Value
column.tooltip: Probability that a spectrum matches a random database with a score equal to or exceeding the observed score

column.label: FDR
column.tooltip: False discovery rate

column.label: PepFDR
column.tooltip: Peptide-level false discovery rate estimated using the target-decoy approach

column.label: Cluster Index 1
column.tooltip: Index of first cluster in pair, in clusters file

column.label: Peptide 1
column.tooltip: Peptide identification of first cluster in pair

column.label: Protein 1
column.tooltip: Protein in input database containing sequence of peptide identification of first cluster in pair

column.label: Charge 1
column.tooltip: Identification charge of first cluster in pair

column.label: Cluster Index 2
column.tooltip: Index of second cluster in pair, in clusters file

column.label: Peptide 2
column.tooltip: Peptide identification of second cluster in pair

column.label: Protein 2
column.tooltip: Protein in input database containing sequence of peptide identification of second cluster in pair

column.label: Charge 2
column.tooltip: Identification charge of second cluster in pair

column.label: Mass Offsets
column.tooltip: Mass offsets present in either peptide in pair, rounded to the nearest integer

column.label: Mass Difference
column.tooltip: Mass of first cluster in pair minus mass of second cluster in pair

column.label: Pair Is In Network
column.tooltip: These clusters are neighbors in spectral network

column.label: Pair Is Correct
column.tooltip: 0=incorrect, 1=correct, 2=ambiguous (pair shares over 60% of prefix residue masses)

column.label: Filename
column.tooltip: Name of original input spectrum file containing this spectrum

column.label: Scan
column.tooltip: Scan number of this spectrum in original input spectrum file

column.label: Cluster Index
column.tooltip: Index of the cluster containing this spectrum. Similar spectra are clustered together

column.label: Retention Time
column.tooltip: Mean retention time

column.label: KL
column.tooltip: Kullback-Leibler divergence

column.label: "One-Hit Wonders"
column.tooltip: Proteins identified by exactly one peptide.

column.label: PTMs
column.tooltip: Spectrum identifications, grouped by unique sets of post-translational modifications.

column.label: PSM ID
column.tooltip: PSM ID from within the source MzTab file

column.label: Peak List File
column.tooltip: The name of the peak list file from which this spectrum came, as referenced from within the source MzTab file

column.label: Index
column.tooltip: Spectrum index (0-based) in the file.

column.label: Scan
column.tooltip: Spectrum scan number

column.label: Peptide
column.tooltip: The modified peptide sequence matched to this spectrum

column.label: Modifications
column.tooltip: The positions and accessions of all post-translational modifications found for this spectrum identification

column.label: Protein
column.tooltip: The accession of the protein matched to this spectrum

column.label: Charge
column.tooltip: Precursor ion charge

column.label: Search Engine
column.tooltip: Search engine used to generate this identification

column.label: Valid
column.tooltip: If a spectrum could not be found in the source peak list file, or if the identification contains any ambiguous PTM references, then it will be marked as "INVALID".

column.label: Mass Offset
column.tooltip: Mass offset of modification on either peptide in spectral network pair

column.label: Cos < .45
column.tooltip: Cosine of spectral network pair is less than 0.45

column.label: .45 <= Cos < .55
column.tooltip: Cosine of spectral network pair is between 0.45 and 0.55

column.label: .55 <= Cos < .65
column.tooltip: Cosine of spectral network pair is between 0.55 and 0.65

column.label: .65 <= Cos < .75
column.tooltip: Cosine of spectral network pair is between 0.65 and 0.75

column.label: .75 <= Cos < .85
column.tooltip: Cosine of spectral network pair is between 0.75 and 0.85

column.label: .85 <= Cos < .95
column.tooltip: Cosine of spectral network pair is between 0.85 and 0.95

column.label: Cos >= .95
column.tooltip: Cosine of spectral network pair is at least 0.95

column.label: PSM ID
column.tooltip: PSM ID from within the source MzTab file

column.label: Peak List File
column.tooltip: The name of the peak list file from which this spectrum came, as referenced from within the source MzTab file

column.label: Index
column.tooltip: Spectrum index (0-based) in the file.

column.label: Scan
column.tooltip: Spectrum scan number

column.label: Modified Peptide
column.tooltip: The modified peptide sequence matched to this spectrum

column.label: Cluster Index
column.tooltip: Index of cluster in clusters file. Similar spectra are clustered together via MS Cluster if "Run MS Cluster" was selected

column.label: Filename
column.tooltip: Spectrum filename for unclustered, or cluster representative filename for StrataCluster

column.label: Cluster Charge
column.tooltip: Charge assigned to cluster

column.label: Algorithm
column.tooltip: Algorithm that identified this cluster. MSPLIT2 means M-SPLIT identified this as the second component of a peptide mixture

column.label: Variant Group
column.tooltip: ID assigned to group of peptides with the same unmodified sequence and total mass within the parent mass tolerance of each other

column.label: Peptide-Spectrum Match (PSM)
column.tooltip: Peptide identification of this cluster

column.label: PSM Charge
column.tooltip: Charge assigned by algorithm that identified this cluster

column.label: PSM FDR
column.tooltip: Cluster-level false discovery rate

column.label: Variant FDR
column.tooltip: Variant-level false discovery rate

column.label: Unmodified Sequence
column.tooltip: Peptide sequence with modifications excluded

column.label: Protein Region(s)
column.tooltip: Peptide variant region on the protein

column.label: Protein(s)
column.tooltip: Proteins in input database containing peptide sequence of this PSM

column.label: Canonical Proteins
column.tooltip: Non-human or non-TremBL and non-isoform proteins

column.label: # Network Neighbors
column.tooltip: Number of immediately-adjacent clusters in spectral network component containing this cluster, if this cluster is in a network

column.label: # Spectra
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in this cluster

column.label: # Spectra for Variant
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters assigned the same variant group as this cluster

column.label: Default Groups
column.tooltip: Default groups (G1 through G6 on input form) containing files containing spectra in this cluster

column.label: User-Defined Groups
column.tooltip: User groups (specified in file uploaded to "Group Mapping" section of input form) containing files containing spectra in this cluster

column.label: Start AA
column.tooltip: Start amino acid on protein

column.label: End AA
column.tooltip: End amino acid on protein

column.label: Protein Region Index(es)
column.tooltip: Index of peptide variant region on the protein

column.label: # Mods
column.tooltip: Number of modifications on peptide

column.label: All Mods
column.tooltip: Peptide modifications present, rounded to the nearest integer

column.label: # Spectra G1
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in this cluster in files assigned to default group 1

column.label: # Spectra G2
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in this cluster in files assigned to default group 2

column.label: # Spectra G3
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in this cluster in files assigned to default group 3

column.label: # Spectra G4
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in this cluster in files assigned to default group 4

column.label: # Spectra G5
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in this cluster in files assigned to default group 5

column.label: # Spectra G6
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in this cluster in files assigned to default group 6

column.label: Protein
column.tooltip: Protein name

column.label: Adjacent Proteins
column.tooltip: Proteins that have one or more peptides in common with this protein

column.label: # Spectra
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters whose peptide identification maps to this protein

column.label: Sum Neighbors
column.tooltip: Sum of the number of clusters in spectral networks immediately adjacent to each of the clusters whose peptide identification maps to this protein

column.label: # Unique Spectra
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters whose peptide identification maps ONLY to this protein (i.e., does not map to any other proteins)

column.label: # Spectra G1
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters whose peptide identification maps to this protein in files assigned to default group 1

column.label: # Unique Spectra G1
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters whose peptide identification maps ONLY to this protein in files assigned to default group 1

column.label: # Spectra G2
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters whose peptide identification maps to this protein in files assigned to default group 2

column.label: # Unique Spectra G2
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters whose peptide identification maps ONLY to this protein in files assigned to default group 2

column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters whose peptide identification maps ONLY to this protein in files assigned to default group 3

column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters whose peptide identification maps ONLY to this protein in files assigned to default group 5

column.label: # Spectra G6
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters whose peptide identification maps to this protein in files assigned to default group 6

column.label: # Unique Spectra G6
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters whose peptide identification maps ONLY to this protein in files assigned to default group 6

column.label: Associated Drugs
column.tooltip: Drugs that interact with this protein, via DrugBank. Delimited by vertical bars.

column.label: # Spectra- Top Proteins
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters whose peptide identification maps to this protein, considering only the top protein for each spectrum

column.label: # Spectra G1- Top Proteins
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters whose peptide identification maps to this protein in files assigned to default group 1, considering only the top protein for each spectrum

column.tooltip: Variant-level false discovery rate

column.label: Protein(s)
column.tooltip: All proteins in input database containing sequence of representative cluster peptide identification

column.label: Canonical Proteins
column.tooltip: Non-human or non-TremBL and non-isoform proteins

column.label: # Network Neighbors
column.tooltip: Sum of the number of clusters in spectral networks immediately adjacent to each of the clusters belonging to this variant group

column.label: Spectral Network(s)
column.tooltip: IDs of network components containing any of the clusters belonging to this variant group

column.label: # Spectra
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters belonging to this variant group

column.label: # Spectra for Unmodified Sequence
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters identified as this peptide sequence, ignoring modifications

column.label: # Variants for Unmodified Sequence
column.tooltip: Number of peptide variants corresponding to this peptide sequence

column.label: # Spectra G1
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters belonging to this variant group in files assigned to default group 1

column.label: # Spectra G2
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters belonging to this variant group in files assigned to default group 2

column.label: # Spectra G3
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters belonging to this variant group in files assigned to default group 3

column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters belonging to this variant group in files assigned to default group 4

column.label: # Spectra G5
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters belonging to this variant group in files assigned to default group 5

column.label: # Spectra G6
column.tooltip: Number of spectra in clusters belonging to this variant group in files assigned to default group 6

column.label: Associated Drugs
column.tooltip: Drugs that interact with this protein, via DrugBank. Delimited by vertical bars.

column.label: Variant Group
column.tooltip: ID assigned to group of peptides with the same unmodified sequence and total mass within the parent mass tolerance of each other

column.label: Cluster Index
column.tooltip: Index in clusters file of representative cluster for this variant. Similar spectra are clustered together via MS Cluster if "Run MS Cluster" was selected

column.label: Peptide
column.tooltip: Peptide identification of representative cluster

column.label: Filename
column.tooltip: Spectrum filename for unclustered, or cluster representative filename for StrataCluster

column.label: Precursor Charge
column.tooltip: Charge assigned to representative cluster

column.label: # Mods
column.tooltip: Number of modifications on peptide in representative cluster PSM

column.label: All Mods
column.tooltip: Modifications present in all peptides assigned to this variant group, rounded to the nearest integer

column.label: Protein Region Index
column.tooltip: Index of peptide variant region on the protein

column.label: Protein Region
column.tooltip: Peptide variant region on the protein

column.tooltip: Protein name

column.tooltip: Start amino acid on protein

column.label: PSP diseases
column.tooltip: Diseases between the start and end amino acid on this protein, via PhosphoSitePlus database. Not for commercial use; see license at http://www.phosphosite.org/staticDownloads.action

column.label: PSP regulatory function
column.tooltip: Regulatory functions between the start and end amino acid on this protein, via PhosphoSitePlus database. Not for commercial use; see license at http://www.phosphosite.org/staticDownloads.action

column.label: PSP regulatory interactions
column.tooltip: Regulatory interactions between the start and end amino acid on this protein, via PhosphoSitePlus database. Not for commercial use; see license at http://www.phosphosite.org/staticDownloads.action

column.label: PSP modifications
column.tooltip: Modifications between the start and end amino acid on this protein, via PhosphoSitePlus database. Not for commercial use; see license at http://www.phosphosite.org/staticDownloads.action

column.label: PSP PTM variants
column.tooltip: Post-translation modification variants between the start and end amino acid on this protein, via PhosphoSitePlus database. Not for commercial use; see license at http://www.phosphosite.org/staticDownloads.action

column.label: PSP site match
column.tooltip: The number of entries in PSP files for modified amino acids between the start and end amino acid. Not for commercial use; see license at http://www.phosphosite.org/staticDownloads.action

column.label: Associated Drugs
column.tooltip: Drugs that interact with this protein, via DrugBank. Delimited with vertical bars.

column.label: # PSP/DrugBank Events
column.tooltip: Number of non-N/A PSP and DrugBank columns

column.label: Cluster Index
column.tooltip: Index of cluster in clusters file. Similar spectra are clustered together via MS Cluster if "Run MS Cluster" was selected

column.label: Filename
column.tooltip: Spectrum filename for unclustered, or cluster representative filename for StrataCluster

column.label: Cluster Charge
column.tooltip: Charge assigned to cluster

column.label: Algorithm
column.tooltip: Algorithm that identified this cluster. MSPLIT2 means M-SPLIT identified this as the second component of a peptide mixture

column.label: Variant Group
column.tooltip: ID assigned to group of peptides with the same unmodified sequence and total mass within the parent mass tolerance of each other

column.tooltip: User groups (specified in file uploaded to "Group Mapping" section of input form) containing files containing spectra in this cluster
